attributes.title: Common Roots Cafe -- chicken and white wine
attributes.description:
Created on December 6, 2010 by dpeters on Sourcemap.org:

When you order chicken and white wine at the Common Roots Cafe in Minneapolis, MN, here's where the ingredients come from. Common Roots owner Danny Schwartzman, who stresses the use of local food, provided the information, and the map was created by Minnesota Public Radio News' Ground Level project.
